name: void_pandemonium
description:
You play as a hacker who found a way to interact with a strange dimension, where someone (or something) gave him the task of protecting his world at all costs.

You will be traversing different strange worlds in order to kill three avatars of the Great Old Ones who are trying to invade your world.

We are french 3D students and this was our last school project of the year, an action game inspired by Lovecraft's works.

We plan on updating this project shortly after release for fixing bugs and add things we couldn't afford because of time constraints. Please understand that this is a prototype and isn't super polished as of right now and probably won't ever be.

Below is also included a download for a document we put together during production, showcasing some artwork and designs. It's in french though so beware of the baguette.

A game made by all these amazing people :
